item.title: How to Securely Connect to Virtual Private Server
item.description: For your information, this tutorial is not written by me absolutely, I’ve used ssh connection part of this tutorial and added some comments to make individual tutorial on “how to create your own vpn” and also covers the things that we can implement to make our vps the way more secure. Generating SSH keys Using a cleartext password to log in to your server is never a good idea since the password is not encrypted in transit and can be exposed on a hostile network.
